data.title: List of U.S. States and Provinces in Canada
data.meta_description: A comprehensive guide to all States and Provinces with livability scores, city data, demographics and reviews. Select a State or Province to find the perfect place to live.
data.text:
List of States

List of Provinces and Territories

When you look at a map of the United States and Canada, you will see all 50 states, 10 provinces, 3 territories and almost 4,000,000 square miles of space, encompassing a total population of almost 375,000,000 people. With some 50,000 places to live in the mix, if you're looking for a new place to call home, there are many great options. Cities like New York and Toronto have some of the finest attractions in the world, while you can find world class restaurants and nightlife in Las Vegas, Los Angeles and Montréal. Both the U.S. and Canada offer breathtaking coastlines, soaring mountain ranges, bustling metropolises and quiet rural towns, providing a wide range of experiences for residents. But with the good, comes the bad. There are some areas that you might want to avoid and AreaVibes can help you with that.

Based on the demographics, the United States and Canada are both incredibly diverse. There is a long list of U.S. states and Canadian provices that offer incredible relocation options, but how do you find the perfect place to live? With detailed data and statistics for the most important items like: local amenities, commute (public transit), cost of living, crime, employment, health & safety, schools, real estate, user ratings and more, AreaVibes can help you find the perfect place to call home. Best of all, all the work is done for you. Using a complex algorithm, AreaVibes calculates an overall Livability Score for each city and neighborhood based on dozens of different data points, across multiple categories, so that you can quickly and easily identify great places to live and avoid the not so good areas all together.

By aggregating this wealth of information, AreaVibes empowers users to quickly and effortlessly compare data from all states, provinces and territories, highlighting the best-suited options for your wants and needs. Whether you're looking for a family-friendly community with excellent schools, a thriving job market and low crime rates or an urban environment with vibrant cultural offerings and easy access to public transportation, the Livability Score serves as a compass to guide you in your quest for the perfect place to call home.

If you're still having trouble deciding on a new state or province to call home, AreaVibes offers even more support. In each area you'll find user submitted data from actual residents to help you dig even deeper. These surveys can answer questions like “Is this city safe at night?” or “How friendly are the neighbors?” By tapping into the collective wisdom of current residents, AreaVibes creates a dynamic and interactive platform where users can connect with others who have experienced or are experiencing life in their potential new home. This community-driven approach fosters trust, camaraderie and a genuine sense of sharing, making the decision-making process more informed, comfortable and rewarding. Along with all this useful information AreaVibes also provides photos of most cities as well as detailed neighborhood data.

If you are considering a move and looking for the perfect place to call home, AreaVibes is the first step in the relocation process. With a list of all 50 states and provinces at your fingertips, you can embark on a journey of exploration and discovery to find the ideal location that suits your lifestyle.
